channel.title: Anyone bothered by the increase of DURRR on this site?
channel.description:
I knew that things would change once the mod was released, but I never expected so much durrrr to occur. Even oldies have turned into complete morons since the mod was released.
I'm mainly talking about the idiotic [b]"<This> needs changing"[/b] threads. Of course, some of them are pretty valid suggestions; but you have to admit that 90% of them are utterly retarded.
IQs were never majorly high here to begin with. Now I think they've dropped to an all time low.
So, I thought I'd go ahead and list some of the most stupid complaints/suggestions I've read so far;
---------------------------------------
One guy complained that there was too much deviation from the original. And I don't just mean added bits of map, but the fact that they had changed anything at all (e.g. additional signs, vending machines, cars, cacti)
There was a mild amount of rage over the changing of the crowbar location.
Sorry Oldfag (you know who you are) but in-game cut scenes are just retarded. Valve went into great detail as to why they don't use such scenes often in their games. Their reasons were very good. So why you'd want to break the pacing and immersion is beyond me.
The complaints about the tentacles have been dumb. A few people are genuinely upset that you have to run past them rather than crawl. Big deal.

It’s not these threads which annoy me the most. It’s the ‘hai guyz wher is zen??? Wtff’ posts. If I were a mod I’d tell them to use their fucking eyes and then ban their ass. Good thing I’m not a mod I guess.

item.title: Anyone bothered by the increase of DURRR on this site?
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

I’m more bothered by the countless Let’s Play’s topics that get posted every day. I mean who is seriously going to watch some derp play through the entire game while talking to themselves instead of actually, you know, downloading and playing it themselves.

I have been… Because I don’t have a computer to play it on right now…

But I have been quite derp myself lately anyway…

Read full topic
